languages.text: "На тебя охотятся, Домин'{name}, гонят, словно зверя на ловчего. Он — ловчий". {n}Худощавый паренек, лишь вчера переставший быть мальчиком, держится с удивительными достоинством и отстраненностью.{/n} "Висирь сказал, что ему пора умереть, а тебе — нет".

"You are being hunted, Domin'{name}, driven like prey toward the hunter. He is the hunter." {n}The skinny young man, who ceased to be a boy only yesterday, carries himself with detachment and surprising dignity.{/n} "The Vizsier said that he must die and that you must live."
languages.original_text: "На тебя охотятся, Домин'{name}, гонят, словно зверя на ловчего. Он — ловчий". {n}Худощавый паренек, лишь вчера переставший быть мальчиком, держится с удивительными достоинством и отстраненностью.{/n} "Висирь сказал, что ему пора умереть, а тебе — нет".

traits.locale_text: "You are bring hunted, Enim'{name}, driven like a beast toward the hunter. He is the hunter." {n}The skinny young man, who ceased to be a boy only yesterday, carries himself with detachment and surprising dignity.{/n} "The Vizsier said that he must die and that you must live."

"You are being hunted, Domin'{name}, driven like prey toward the hunter. He is the hunter." {n}The skinny young man, who ceased to be a boy only yesterday, carries himself with detachment and surprising dignity.{/n} "The Vizsier said that he must die and that you must live."

languages.text: «L{mf|e|a} están cazando, Domin'{name}; l{mf|e|a} guían como a una presa hacia el cazador. Y el cazador es él». {n}El joven delgado, que parece haber sido un niño hasta ayer mismo, actúa con desapego y una dignidad sorprendente.{/n} «El Visir dice que él debe morir y usted debe vivir».
languages.original_text: "You are being hunted, Domin'{name}, driven like prey toward the hunter. He is the hunter." {n}The skinny young man, who ceased to be a boy only yesterday, carries himself with detachment and surprising dignity.{/n} "The Vizsier said that he must die and that you must live."

traits.locale_text: «L{mf|e|a} están cazando, Domin'{name}; l{mf|e|a} guían como a una presa hacia el cazador. Y el cazador es él». {n}El joven delgado, que parece haber sido un niño hasta ayer mismo, actúa con desapego y una dignidad sorprendente.{/n} «El Visir dice que él debe morir y usted debe vivir».

languages.text: 「ドミン・{name}、あなたは狙われている。まるでハンターに向かって行く獲物だ。彼はハンターなのだ」{n}昨日まで少年だったような痩せた青年から、冷静で驚くほどの威厳を感じる。{/n}「ヴィジールが、彼は死に、あなたは生きるべきだと言った」
languages.original_text: "You are being hunted, Domin'{name}, driven like prey toward the hunter. He is the hunter." {n}The skinny young man, who ceased to be a boy only yesterday, carries himself with detachment and surprising dignity.{/n} "The Vizsier said that he must die and that you must live."

traits.locale_text: 「エニム・{name}、あなたは狙われている。まるでハンターに向かって行く獲物だ。彼はハンターなのだ」{n}昨日まで少年だったような痩せた青年から、冷静で驚くほどの威厳を感じる。{/n}「ヴィジールが、彼は死に、あなたは生きるべきだと言った」

languages.text: “您正在遭到追捕，秘者{name}，像猎物一样被赶到猎手身边。而他是猎手。”{n}这个瘦骨嶙峋的年轻人看起来不过是个半大孩子，但却带着令人惊讶的镇定与超然。{/n}“宿老说他必须死，而您必须活下去。”
languages.original_text: "You are being hunted, Domin'{name}, driven like prey toward the hunter. He is the hunter." {n}The skinny young man, who ceased to be a boy only yesterday, carries himself with detachment and surprising dignity.{/n} "The Vizsier said that he must die and that you must live."

traits.locale_text: “您正在遭到追捕，秘者{name}，像猎物一样被赶到猎手身边。而他是猎手。”{n}这个瘦骨嶙峋的年轻人看起来不过是个半大孩子，但却带着令人惊讶的镇定与超然。{/n}“宿老说他必须死，而您必须活下去。”

languages.text: "Ihr werdet gejagt, Domin'{name}, getrieben wie Beute zum Jäger. Er ist der Jäger." {n}Der hagere junge Mann, der erst gestern aufgehört hat, ein Junge zu sein, hat eine distanzierte und erstaunlich würdevolle Ausstrahlung.{/n} "Der Wesir sagt, er muss sterben und Ihr müsst leben."
languages.original_text: "You are being hunted, Domin'{name}, driven like prey toward the hunter. He is the hunter." {n}The skinny young man, who ceased to be a boy only yesterday, carries himself with detachment and surprising dignity.{/n} "The Vizsier said that he must die and that you must live."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr werdet gejagt, Domin'{name}, getrieben wie Beute zum Jäger. Er ist der Jäger." {n}Der hagere junge Mann, der erst gestern aufgehört hat, ein Junge zu sein, hat eine distanzierte und erstaunlich würdevolle Ausstrahlung.{/n} "Der Wesir sagt, er muss sterben und Ihr müsst leben."

languages.text: « Vous êtes une proie, Domin'{name}. Une proie lentement, mais sûrement poussée vers le chasseur. Et le chasseur, c'est lui. » {n}Le garçon malingre, qui semble à peine entré dans l'adolescence, fait preuve d'un détachement et d'une dignité surprenante pour son âge.{/n} « Le vizir dit qu'il doit mourir et que vous devez vivre. »
languages.original_text: "You are being hunted, Domin'{name}, driven like prey toward the hunter. He is the hunter." {n}The skinny young man, who ceased to be a boy only yesterday, carries himself with detachment and surprising dignity.{/n} "The Vizsier said that he must die and that you must live."

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes une proie, Domin'{name}. Une proie lentement, mais sûrement poussée vers le chasseur. Et le chasseur, c'est lui. » {n}Le garçon malingre, qui semble à peine entré dans l'adolescence, fait preuve d'un détachement et d'une dignité surprenante pour son âge.{/n} « Le vizir dit qu'il doit mourir et que vous devez vivre. »

languages.text: "Domin'{name}, avlanmaktasın. Avcı, seni bir av gibi güdüyor. Bu avcı, onun ta kendisidir." {n}Oğlanlıktan yeni çıkmış zayıf genç, kayıtsız ve şaşırtıcı derecede ciddiyet sahibi.{/n} "Vezir, senin yaşayıp onun ölmesini buyurdu."
languages.original_text: "You are being hunted, Domin'{name}, driven like prey toward the hunter. He is the hunter." {n}The skinny young man, who ceased to be a boy only yesterday, carries himself with detachment and surprising dignity.{/n} "The Vizsier said that he must die and that you must live."
